name: Wizard Tower
description: A mysterious wizard tower houses powerful magic users and ancient knowledge, offering access to magical services and education, but the magical nature creates both wonder and fear. The concentration of magical power attracts both students and enemies, while the magical defenses can be both protective and dangerous.
atmosphere: Arcane symbols glow with eerie blue light carved into stone walls. The air crackles with magical energy and strange bubbling sounds drift from upper floors. Sharp scents of sulfur, rare herbs, and old parchment mingle in the air. Floating books and crystalline apparatus hover near spiral staircases.
